Nusura Tiperu Omar bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu Uganda

Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu itoolu na-anọchite anya Uganda na 3rd East African Legislative Assembly (EALA) na Arusha, Tanzania. A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na June 2012, maka afọ ise sochirinụ. Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'otu ikike ahụ site na June 2007 ruo June 2012, n'oge nnọkọ nke abụọ nke EALA.
A mụrụ ya na Yumbe District, West Nile sub-region, na Northern Uganda na 21 Ọktoba 1974
Nusura Tiperu gara Mukono Town Academy na Mukono District maka ọmụmụ A-Level ya, site na 1992 ruo 1993
Ọ banyere na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum kachasị ochie na Uganda, ebe ọ gụrụ Social Sciences site na 1994 ruo 1997
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Sciences.
Site na 1996 ruo 2001, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Female Youth Member of Parliament, na-anọchite anya ụmụ agbọghọ niile nọ na Uganda
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị omebe iwu, na-anọchite anya Yumbe District na omebe iwu site na 2001 ruo 2006
Site na 2007 ruo 2012, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Ome Iwu nke East Africa na Arusha, Tanzania, na-anọchite anya Republic of Uganda
Na June 2012, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ rụọ ọrụ n'otu ikike ahụ maka afọ ise ọzọ.
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke International Muslim Women's Union

Ọ bụkwa onye otu Central Executive Committee nke National Resistance Movement, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị Uganda kemgbe 1986. Nusura Tiperu Omar lụrụ di. A na-akọ na ọ na-asụ asụsụ ndị a nke ọma: Bekee, Swahili, Alur, Aringa na Luganda
Site na 2012 ruo 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu EALA Commission
Kọmitii ahụ "na-ahụ maka ihe omume nke Nzukọ ahụ, na-ahazi azụmahịa na mmemme nke Ụlọ ahụ, ma na-ahọpụta ndị otu kọmitii ndị ọzọ".
